attributes.action: Reconsider the imminent deportation of Pride Mbi Agbor
attributes.additional_details: Here in Sheffield, Pride plays an integral role in Conversation Club, a registered charity that teaches English and helps new asylum seekers and refugees to get settled in their new home. He also coaches for Global Community Basketball, an initiative funded by the University of Sheffield to teach asylum seekers basketball. Most importantly Pride is the nicest person you would ever wish to meet, a true inspiration. We must delay his deportation until new evidence can be brought to light on27/3/17
attributes.background: Pride is a upstanding member of the Sheffield community and his life will be endangered by deporting him. Representing the marginalised English speakers in his native Cameroon he campaigns tirelessly for human rights even after many of his friends have been killed in his home country.
